clusterList.phrase: mortalities at hands of indian government include over 250 000 sikh men women and children since 1984 300 000 christians in nagaland and elsewhere 90 000 muslims in kashmir tens of thousands of assamese bodos dalits manipuris tamils and other minorities it is reported that more than 52 000 sikhs remain imprisoned without charge or trial under tada an act which expired in 1995 according to amnesty international tens of thousands of other minorities are also being held as political prisoners
